full_summary:
**
**Notice - Request for Proposal (RFP)**

**Solicitation Title**
-------------------

**Cisco Meraki or Equivalent Solution for Canadian Grain Commission**

### General Information
----------------

*   Solicitation Reference Number: SSC-24-00026639:T
*   Amendment Number: 1
*   Solicitation Number: BPM021483/26639
*   Publication Date: May 31, 2024
*   Tender Closing Date: June 18, 2024, 14:00 Eastern Time

### Project Overview
-----------------

This solicitation seeks proposals for a Cisco Meraki or equivalent solution to support the Canadian Grain Commission. The selected bidder must provide a comprehensive solution, including all required hardware, software, and implementation services.

### Proposal Guidelines
-----------------

To participate in this solicitation, potential bidders must register on the Shared Services Canada (SSC) Procurement Portal. This will provide access to relevant documentation, including the RFP, contract, and any amendments.

### Solicitation Details
-----------------

*   Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   Regions of Opportunity: Canada
*   Regions of Delivery: Ontario (excluding the National Capital Region)
*   Contact Information
    *   Name: Sandra Ladouceur
    *   Phone: 613-302-0766
    *   Fax: 613-960-6026
    *   Email: [None]
    *   Address: 180 Kent Street, Ottawa, ON K1G 4A8

### Supporting Documentation
-------------------------

Attachments to this solicitation can be accessed through the following links:

*   [English](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download_public/761ADCF5-C69B-4526-A88D-6A19A744CA7E)
*   [French](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/fr/fil/download_public/060983DB-D87E-43A2-B204-5A45B27BF02F)

### Important Dates
-----------------

The tender closing date is June 18, 2024, at 14:00 Eastern Time. Late submissions will not be accepted. It is the bidder's responsibility to ensure that their proposal is submitted on time.

### Contact Information for Further Clarification
------------------------------------------

If you have any questions or require further clarification on the solicitation, please contact:

S
